main_definition: Trains refer to multiple meanings, including the transportation system (railway trains) and an expression used when emphasizing continuous or frequent improvement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A railway train consisting of a series of connected vehicles that move along tracks
meanings_and_examples.example: The passengers eagerly boarded the sleek, modern trains to travel across the country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom used to emphasize continuous or frequent improvement in an area or skill
meanings_and_examples.example: She's been training hard to improve her skills and she finally got a promotion due to her consistent efforts.
